ForearmsSLGrip.name: Sled One Hand Grip
ForearmsSLGrip.preparation: Stand in front of apparatus. Grasp bar grips with one hand fingers around far bar and base of thumb around near stationary bar.
ForearmsSLGrip.execution: Squeeze bar grips together until far bar makes contact with nearest bar. Release to original position and repeat.
ForearmsSLGrip.comments: See sled grip up close. Also see muscles for finger articulations and thumb articulations.
